summary: Romantic, soft, interactive 5-page birthday surprise website with pastel dreamy aesthetic, animated hearts/glitter/stars, recurring cartoon rabbit, smooth page fade transitions, background music, and per-page interactive prompts plus replay.
architectural_notes: Structure site as 5 distinct pages/views with consistent themed styling and a reusable heart-shaped 'Next' navigation component.
Provide global background music playback across navigation with user-friendly control considerations (e.g., autoplay restrictions).
Implement reusable animation layers (hearts/glitter/stars) and per-page decorative variants including rabbit character assets.
Use smooth fade transitions for page changes to maintain dreamy feel.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Cute cartoon rabbit hopping pose, pastel outline, dreamy style (rabbit-hopping.dim_512x512.png)
- Cute cartoon rabbit holding a tiny balloon, pastel outline, dreamy style (rabbit-balloon.dim_512x512.png)
- Soft pastel sky background with subtle clouds and dreamy gradient (pastel-sky-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Small soft-gold sparkle/stars overlay tile, seamless pattern (sparkle-tile.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title:

Page 4 â€” Good Luck & Love Page

Apply a consistent romantic, pastel, dreamy visual theme across all pages using: baby blue, lavender, blush pink, cream, and soft gold sparkles. The overall feel must be warm, personal, and â€œmagical like a birthday surprise.â€
Add smooth fade transitions between pages/screens so navigation feels gentle and magical (including when using â€œNextâ€ and â€œReplay the Surpriseâ€).

Implement ambient animated visuals throughout the experience:
- Floating hearts
- Gentle glitter
- Tiny stars
Also include page-specific visuals:
- Page 1: floating hearts background + a cute hopping rabbit
- Page 2: soft sparkles around the text
- Page 3: a cute rabbit holding a tiny balloon
- Page 4: glowing gold sparkles + slow floating hearts
- Page 5: confetti hearts, flying balloons, glitter rain, cute rabbits, and a soft pastel sky background

Add soft instrumental background music that plays across the whole experience with gentle behavior:
- Starts automatically when the experience begins (with a clear fallback if autoplay is blocked)
- Loops seamlessly
- Does not restart on every page navigation
- Provide a simple, unobtrusive control to mute/unmute (and optionally adjust volume)

Capture and use the userâ€™s interactions on each page in the UI:
- Page 1: selecting a feeling option visibly highlights the selected option (and keeps it selected until changed)
- Page 2: selecting a memory option visibly highlights the selected option
- Page 3: wish input should allow typing and preserve the entered text when navigating forward/back during the session
- Optional: On Page 5, reflect the Page 3 wish somewhere subtly (only if it can be done without adding new user-facing text beyond whatâ€™s already specified)

Add required static assets (generated images) to the frontend and use them in the UI/animations. Store generated assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them directly from the frontend (do not serve images through the backend).

new_feature_requests.summary: Build 5-page interactive birthday website with specified page content (Welcome, Memories, Wish input, Love/Good luck message, Finale)
Implement pastel dreamy theme (baby blue, lavender, blush pink, cream) with soft gold sparkle accents and warm magical styling
Add animated visuals: floating hearts, gentle glitter, tiny stars; finale effects (confetti hearts, balloons, glitter rain)
Include cute cartoon rabbit appearing across pages with variations (hopping on page 1, holding balloon on page 3, plus finale rabbits)
Add smooth fade transitions between pages and heart-shaped 'Next' navigation button on each page
Add soft instrumental background music throughout the experience
Add Finale 'Replay the Surprise' button to restart the experience

projectName: Romantic pastel 5-page interactive birthday surprise site with animations, music, and replay
